packs.name: Back to Blocks
packs.description: Allows you to craft full blocks from stairs and slabs.

packs.name: Double Slabs
packs.description: Allows you to craft 2 slabs from a single block.

packs.name: Dropper to Dispenser
packs.description: Allows you to convert a Dropper to a Dispenser using a Bow, or by using String and Sticks.

packs.name: Rotten Flesh to Leather
packs.description: Allows you to smelt Rotten Flesh into Leather in Furnaces, Smokers or Campfires.

packs.name: Copper Powered Rails
packs.description: Lets you craft powered rails from copper. (But you can still craft them from gold!)

packs.name: Charcoal to Black Dye
packs.description: Allows you to craft Charcoal into Black Dye.

packs.name: Coal to Black Dye
packs.description: Allows you to craft Coal into Black Dye.

packs.name: Sandstone Dyeing
packs.description: Allows you to craft Sandstone with Red Dye to get Red Sandstone.

packs.name: Universal Dyeing
packs.description: Allows you to dye any dyeable block to another color, no matter what color it is (does not include, Concrete, Candles or Glazed Terracotta).

packs.name: Straight to Shapeless
packs.description: Craft items such as Paper, Bread and Shulker Boxes directly in your 2x2.

packs.name: Alternate Cobblestone
packs.description: Craft all items that require Cobblestone, using Blackstone or Cobbled Deepslate.

packs.name: Powder to Glass
packs.description: Smelt all colors of Concrete Powder into their respective Stained Glass color.

packs.name: More Trapdoors
packs.description: Creates 12 Trapdoors instead of 2.

packs.name: More Bark
packs.description: Creates 4 Bark instead of 3.

packs.name: More Stairs
packs.description: Creates 8 Stairs instead of 4.

packs.name: More Bricks
packs.description: Creates 4 Bricks, Nether Bricks and Red Nether Bricks instead of 1.

packs.name: Craftable Gravel
packs.description: Allows you to craft Gravel from Flint.

packs.name: Craftable Horse Armor
packs.description: Allows you to craft Horse Armor.

packs.name: Craftable Coral Blocks 2x2
packs.description: Allows you to craft Coral Blocks and their dead variants from their Coral Plant or Coral Tube in a 2x2. Tubes and Fans are not interchangeable.

packs.name: Craftable Coral Blocks 3x3
packs.description: Allows you to craft Coral Blocks and their dead variants from their Coral Plant or Coral Tube in a 3x3. Tubes and Fans are not interchangeable.

packs.name: Craftable Enchanted Golden Apple
packs.description: Allows you to craft Enchanted Golden Apples.

packs.name: Craftable Name Tags
packs.description: Allows you to craft Name Tags.

packs.name: Craftable Blackstone
packs.description: Allows you to craft Blackstone or Polished Blackstone, using Basalt & Coal/Charcoal.

packs.name: Unpackable Ice
packs.description: Allows you to break down Ice into 9 pieces. 1 Blue Ice to 9 Packed Ice to 81 Ice.

packs.name: Unpackable Nether Wart
packs.description: Allows you to break down Nether Wart Blocks into 9 Nether Wart.

packs.name: Unpackable Wool
packs.description: Allows you to break down Wool into 4 String.

packs.name: Unpackable Magma
packs.description: Allows you to break down Magma Blocks into 4 Magma Creams.
